title: Dead or Alive 5
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Experience blockbuster stages as you knock your opponents off an exotic waterfall, into an exploding oil rig and more. Over 20 of the hottest characters in fighting games including ninjas, assassins, roughnecks & wrestlers! The rich story and training modes will get newcomers used to the signature DOA Triangle System, and the full-featured online modes will let the best fighters in the world compete with each other. This is fighting entertainment! This is Dead or Alive!

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Dead or Alive 5 Angels
childDownloads.description: Dead or Alive's angels - Kasumi, Hitomi and Leifang - show their fun side with white bikinis and bunny ears. These new costumes show off the revamped character models of Dead or Alive 5, which have won high praise from critics and fans alike. The best looking fighters just got better with three bunny-eared bikinis!

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
